actionGroupResourceId.value: [if(parameters('useExistingAG'), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', parameters('subscriptionId'), parameters('existingAGRG')), 'Microsoft.Insights/actionGroups', parameters('actionGroupName')), reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', parameters('subscriptionId'), parameters('newRGresourceGroup')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', variables('deploymentName')), '2022-09-01').outputs.agGroupId.value)]

policyDescription.value: [format('Policy to associate the diagnostics setting for {0} resources the tagged with {1} tag.', split(variables('resourceTypes')[copyIndex()], '/')[1], parameters('packtag'))]

policyDisplayName.value: [format('Associate the diagnostics with the {0} resources tagged with {1} tag.', split(variables('resourceTypes')[copyIndex()], '/')[1], parameters('packtag'))]

metadata.description: A tag to apply the association conditionally.
The the full Microsoft.ResourceProvider/resourceType format of the resource type to apply the policy to.
Enable or disable the execution of the policy
The Id of the Log Analytics workspace.

alertDisplayName.value: [AMSP] Deploy VPN Gateway Egress Packet Drop Count Alert

alertDescription.value: AMSP policy to audit/deploy VPN Gateway Egress Packet Drop Count Alert

metadata.description: A tag to apply the association conditionally.
A tag to apply the association conditionally.
Action Group Resource Id for the alert
Min Failing Periods To Alert for the alert
Number Of Evaluation Periods for the alert
Resource ID of the resource emitting the metric that will be used for the comparison
Metric namespace of the metric that will be used for the comparison
Metric Name that will be used for the comparison
alert operator for metric threshold compatirson, like GreaterThan, LessThan, GreaterOrLessThan
Required. Specifies the name of the policy definition. Maximum length is 64 characters.
Optional. The display name of the policy definition. Maximum length is 128 characters.
Optional. The policy definition mode. Default is All, Some examples are All, Indexed, Microsoft.KeyVault.Data.
Optional. The policy Definition metadata. Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key-value pairs.
Optional. The policy definition parameters that can be used in policy definition references.
Required. The Policy Rule details for the Policy Definition.
Optional. The group ID of the Management Group. If not provided, will use the current scope for deployment.
Optional. Enable telemetry via the Customer Usage Attribution ID (GUID).
